data.md:MetaData: Lead 210 determinations in sediment core PS69/275-2

1 surface sample sedimentology, 1 surface sample archive, 2 core section: 0-0.27 m, 1 frozen subcore, 2x10 discrete samples from 0-26 cmbsf, 1 calcareous microfossil specimens sample, olive (5Y 4/4) mud, greenish material (pellets?), several brittle stars and unidentified calcareous microfossils on top
Age assignment of a diatomaceous ooze deposited in the western Amundsen Sea Embayment after the last glacial maximum
